titleStmt.title: A jolly Company of jovial blades who laugh and are as merry as the maids; ... to the tune of General Monk hath advanc'd himself since he came from the Tower.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Contains three woodcut illustrations; right half sheet contains The Second Part, to the same Tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
